overview.title: Overview
overview.body: The Referral Bonus rewards affiliates based on the wager turnover from referred players in Slots , Live Casino , Sportsbooks and Lottery. Commissions are calculated every 24 hours, with earnings based on different turnover tiers.

calculation.title: How Commissions Are Calculated
calculation.desc:
Commissions are calculated every 24 hours based on referred players' total wagers. 
Examples:

points.0: Commissions are available for withdrawal once calculated.
points.1: There is no expiration for unclaimed commissions‚Äîthey accumulate until claimed.
points.2: Withdrawals follow the platform's standard rules, such as minimum limits and processing times.

system.title: System Time and Operations
system.claimDailyValue: Available daily at 14:00 UTC (Your Local Time: {local}).
system.note: Note: While we work with providers from different time zones, all calculations follow UTC to ensure consistency and avoid confusion.

about.title: üéÆ About {siteName}
about.subtitle: At {siteName}, gaming isn't just something to fill the time‚Äîit's about real excitement. That moment when you hit a big win, or when everything just clicks, that's what we're all about.

meta.title: About {siteName} | Trusted Global Online Casino Platform
meta.description: Learn about {siteName} a secure, global casino platform offering slots, live casino, sports betting, and poker. Fair, fast, and built for real players.

intro.paragraph1: We built {siteName} for players who want more out of their game. More speed. More fairness. More thrills. Whether you're into live casino games, sports betting, poker, or chasing jackpots on high-stakes slots, you'll find it all here, and you can count on us to keep things legit.
intro.paragraph2: From day one, we wanted {siteName} to feel real. Not just another website, but a place where you get a secure, exciting gaming experience every time you log in.

whoWeAre.title: üíé Who We Are
whoWeAre.paragraph1: {siteName} connects players from all over the world to thousands of top casino and betting games. We work with the biggest names in the industry‚ÄîPragmatic Play, Red Tiger, Microgaming, KA Gaming‚Äîso every game runs smooth and looks great, whether you're playing on your phone or your laptop.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: Every spin, every deal, every bonus‚Äîeverything's set up to give you that rush of real gaming. And we keep things straightforward. No tricks, no sneaky rules. Just honest, clear play.

mission.title: üéØ Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: We want online gaming to be simple, safe, and actually fun.
mission.paragraph2: We keep things personal. Fast deposits, fast withdrawals. A clean look that's easy on the eyes. Support that actually helps when you need it.|At {siteName}, you're always in the spotlight. Your trust drives us to keep improving.

whatMakesUsDifferent.title: üèÜ What Makes {siteName} Different
features: Over 5,000 games‚Äîslots, poker, sports, live casino
Every game is RNG-certified for fairness
A clean design that works anywhere
Fresh bonuses and promos all the time
whatMakesUsDifferent.closing: We're not just here to offer games. We're here to build a place where you feel safe, connected, and ready to take on your next challenge.

fairGaming.title: üåç Fair & Responsible Gaming
fairGaming.paragraph1: We take fairness seriously. That means sticking to international standards, and keeping things clear‚Äîonly players 18 and up, no exceptions.
fairGaming.paragraph2: We test every game for fairness, and our encryption tech keeps your info safe and sound.

promise.title: ü§ù Our Promise
promise.paragraph1: We're not here to blend in. We're here to set the bar higher for online gaming.
promise.paragraph2: When you play at {siteName}, you're using a platform built on trust and new ideas. Every update, new feature, or partnership is about making your experience better.

joinCommunity.title: üöÄ Join the {siteName} Community
joinCommunity.paragraph1: Online gaming is moving fast, and {siteName} is already ahead of the curve‚Äîquicker, smarter, and more rewarding.
joinCommunity.paragraph2: Join now. Grab your welcome bonus. See why so many players around the world are making {siteName} their go-to spot.

seoContent.title: Description
seoContent.paragraph1: Welcome to {siteName}, where crypto meets the real rush of casino gaming. If you're looking for something fresh in the world of online play, you've just found it. {siteName} is built for people who want speed, security, and, above all, games that actually entertain‚Äîwhether you're into spinning slots, live tables, sports bets, or want to try out those crypto-only games you can't find anywhere else.
seoContent.paragraph2: Everything runs on blockchain, so you can trust every outcome. Results are random, verified on the spot. No tricks. Just straight-up wins and real excitement. High roller? Strategy fan? Maybe you just want to kick back and play for a bit. There's something here for your style.
seoContent.paragraph3: Getting started couldn't be easier‚Äîdeposit instantly, cash out fast, log in with your Dynamic.xyz wallet, and grab some unique bonuses along the way. {siteName} keeps things moving. No waiting around. No headaches. No matter where you are‚ÄîCanada, Europe, Asia‚Äîour multi-chain setup fits right in with your local crypto options.
seoContent.paragraph4: Thousands already know: this is a smarter way to gamble online. Here, it's not only about chasing wins‚Äîit's about privacy, fairness, and being part of a community that actually gets what players want. {siteName} isn't just another online casino. This is Web3 gambling, rebuilt for people who expect more.
seoContent.tagline: So, are you ready to play smarter, bet safer, and maybe hit it big? Head over to {siteName}.

disclaimer.line2: Gambling can be addictive. Please play responsibly and only bet what you can afford to lose.
disclaimer.line3: If you feel you have a gambling problem, please seek help.

footer.description: {siteName} is your go-to spot for crypto slots, live tables, and sports betting. Dive into blockchain games you can actually trust, grab your winnings straight to your wallet in seconds, and pick up new bonuses every day. It's fast, secure, and totally decentralized‚Äî{siteName} takes online gaming up a notch for players everywhere. Play smart. Win big. Trust {siteName}.

privacy.title: üîí Privacy Policy ‚Äî {siteName}
privacy.subtitle: How {siteName} protects wallet addresses and crypto data with SSL, AML, and GDPR-compliant privacy for secure blockchain gaming.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | {siteName} ‚Äì Crypto Wallet Casino Security
meta.description: Learn how {siteName} protects wallet addresses and crypto data with SSL, AML, and GDPR-compliant privacy for secure blockchain gaming.
meta.keywords: {siteName} privacy policy, {siteName} crypto casino, {siteName} data protection, {siteName} wallet security, crypto gambling privacy, GDPR crypto casino, blockchain casino policy, {siteName} games secure, crypto betting privacy
meta.ogDescription: Explore how {siteName} safeguards your crypto wallet and transaction data with advanced encryption and GDPR-compliant protection.

intro.paragraph1: At {siteName} ("{siteName}," "we," "us," or "our"), we run the {siteName} crypto-casino platform. Here's what happens with your personal and transaction data when you use our website, mobile apps, or any related services ("Services").
intro.paragraph2: {siteName} is a crypto-wallet-only casino. That means all deposits and withdrawals happen through cryptocurrency wallets. We take your privacy seriously and do our best to protect it, while also following the rules (like AML/KYC requirements) and keeping the platform safe and fair for everyone.
intro.paragraph3: If you use {siteName}, you're agreeing to this Privacy Policy.

scope.title: Scope & Acceptance
scope.content: This policy covers everyone using {siteName}. Sometimes we update it. When we do, the new policy goes live on the site, and if you keep using {siteName} after that, it means you're on board with the changes.

dataCollection.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: Since we're crypto wallet only, the data we gather reflects that. Here's what we collect:

accountData.title: A. Account & Identity Data (when needed)
accountData.email: Email (if you give it), display name, account ID.
accountData.kyc: Heads up: Crypto wallets usually keep things anonymous, but sometimes regulations require us to ask for your identity (KYC). We'll only ask when it's absolutely necessary, and we'll make it clear.

walletData.title: B. Wallet & Transaction Data
walletData.addresses: The crypto wallet addresses you connect or use here.
walletData.transactions: On-chain transaction hashes and timestamps (for deposits and withdrawals).
walletData.metadata: Transaction details we need to reconcile payments and spot fraud.

technicalData.title: C. Technical & Usage Data
technicalData.ip: IP address, rough location based on IP, device type, browser, and operating system.
technicalData.session: Session logs, time stamps, games played, wagers, outcomes, pages you visit.
technicalData.cookies: Cookies and analytics to make the site better and smoother for you.

securityData.title: D. Security & Risk Data
securityData.fraud: Fraud signals, device fingerprints, risk scores from anti-fraud partners.
securityData.disputes: Records of disputes, chargebacks, and compliance checks (if they come up).
securityData.note: We don't collect sensitive stuff like your race, religion, or health unless the law requires it and you give clear permission.

purposes.title: Why We Collect Data
purposes.intro: We only use your data for clear, lawful reasons:

items.title: To run the service
items.description: set up and manage accounts, handle wallet deposits/withdrawals, pay winnings.

items.title: For security
items.description: spot and stop abuse, fraud, and money laundering.

items.title: For marketing (if you say yes)
items.description: newsletters, promo offers‚Äîyou always have the option to say no or change your mind later.

purposes.outro: If you give us consent for something like marketing, you can take it back at any time.

cryptoWallet.title: Crypto Wallets & On-Chain Data
points: We only store wallet addresses and on-chain transaction info as long as we need to credit or debit your account, audit transactions, or meet legal requirements.
On-chain data is public by nature. We can't hide blockchain activity, but we do combine it with our own records to keep your account accurate.
If you connect a custodial wallet (like through a third-party provider), you agree to them sharing data with us so we can process your transactions.

dataSharing.title: When We Share Data
dataSharing.intro: We only share your info in a few cases:
items: With regulators or law enforcement if the law requires or to stop illegal activity.
With affiliates or third parties if there's a business transfer (like a merger or acquisition)‚Äîbut always with the right protections.
With fraud prevention networks to keep the platform and our users safe.
dataSharing.noSelling: We never sell your personal info to advertisers.

security.title: Security Measures
security.intro: We use security measures you'd expect:
items: TLS/SSL encryption for data in transit, encrypted storage for sensitive info.
Access controls, detailed logging, and role-based permissions.
Regular security audits and vulnerability checks.
Multi-factor authentication (MFA) for our staff‚Äîand you can turn it on for your own account too.
security.warning: Remember: keep your wallet private keys and account details safe. We'll never ask for your private keys.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tools to make the site work, analyze traffic, and (if you agree) for marketing. You can control cookies in your browser settings, but if you turn off essential ones, some things might stop working.

minAge.title: Children & Minimum Age
minAge.content: You have to be 18 or older (or whatever your local law says) to use {siteName}. We actively block underage users and will delete any data if we find out a minor signed up.

breach.title: Breach Notification
breach.content: If there's ever a data breach that puts your rights at risk, we'll notify you and the relevant authorities as the law requires, and we'll work to fix things fast.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We can change this Privacy Policy. If there's a big update, we'll post it on the site and let you know directly when it makes sense.

intro.paragraph1: By registering or connecting your wallet on www.{siteDomain}, you enter into a binding agreement with {siteName} N.V.
intro.paragraph2: If you do not agree with any of these terms, do not access, use, or register on our Website. Read these Terms carefully. If you are uncertain about your rights or obligations, consult a legal advisor in your jurisdiction before using the Website.

ownership.title: 1. {siteName} Ownership
ownership.content1: {siteName} is owned and operated by {siteName} N.V. ('{siteName}', 'We', 'Our', 'Us').
ownership.content2: {siteName} is a crypto-wallet-only casino. All deposits, wagers, and withdrawals are processed through users' cryptocurrency wallets. We support wallet login through Dynamic.xyz and compatible wallet connectors (e.g., WalletConnect / MetaMask).

notice.title: 2. Important Notice
notice.content1: 2.1 By registering or connecting your wallet on www.{siteDomain} (the 'Website'), you enter into a binding agreement with {siteName} N.V. and agree to: (i) these Terms and Conditions; (ii) our Privacy Policy; (iii) our Cookie Policy; (iv) our Affiliate Terms; and (v) our Responsible Gaming Policy.
notice.content2: 2.2 If you do not agree with any of these terms, do not access, use, or register on our Website.
notice.content3: 2.3 Read these Terms carefully. If you are uncertain about your rights or obligations, consult a legal advisor in your jurisdiction before using the Website.

general.title: 3. General Terms
items: Upon registration or wallet connection, you ('User', 'Player', 'You', or 'Your') agree to comply with all {siteName} rules and policies.
This Agreement is a legally binding contract between you and {siteName}.
These Terms become effective the moment you connect your wallet and start using the site.
{siteName} reserves the right to amend or update these Terms at any time. Changes will be published on the Website; continued use constitutes acceptance.
In the event of conflict, these Terms prevail over any other rules, promotions, or external materials.
Only the English version of these Terms is legally binding. Translations are for convenience only.

account.title: 4. Account, Wallet Login & Security
account.intro: {siteName} uses Dynamic.xyz for wallet-based authentication and security measures to protect your account.

walletLogin.title: 4.1 Wallet Login (Dynamic.xyz)
items: {siteName} uses Dynamic.xyz (or other supported connectors) for wallet-based login and authentication. By connecting a wallet, you confirm you are the lawful owner of that wallet and authorize {siteName} to recognize that wallet as your account.
We never request your private keys. You must keep your wallet credentials and device secure. {siteName} is not responsible for losses caused by compromised wallets or leaked private keys.

registration.title: 4.2 Registration Details
items: You may be asked to provide contact details (email, username) for account communication. You must provide accurate information and keep it up to date.
You are responsible for all actions taken using your connected wallet.

security.title: 4.3 Multiple Accounts & Security
items: Only one account per individual is permitted. Multiple accounts or attempts to circumvent limits may result in account suspension and fund forfeiture.
Enable any offered platform security features (for example, 2FA for associated services) and secure your own wallet.
Notify support immediately if you suspect unauthorized access.

eligibility.title: 5. Eligibility & User Warranties
items: You are at least 18 years old (or the minimum legal gambling age in your jurisdiction).
You are legally permitted to use online crypto gambling services where you are located.
You are the lawful owner of the wallet you connect.
You will not use VPNs or location spoofing to bypass regional restrictions.
You will not use the Service for illegal or commercial purposes.
You accept that cryptocurrency value may fluctuate and you bear all market risk.
eligibility.outro: 5.2 If you breach these warranties, {siteName} may suspend or terminate access and withhold funds where permitted by law.

restricted.title: 6. Restricted Jurisdictions
restricted.content1: 6.1 {siteName} does not accept players from jurisdictions where crypto gambling is prohibited or restricted. This includes, but is not limited to:
restricted.content2: United States (and U.S. territories), United Kingdom, France, Netherlands, Spain, Germany, Australia, Austria, Comoros, Iran, North Korea, Sudan, Syria, and any jurisdiction listed on FATF blacklists.
restricted.content3: 6.2 Attempting to access the Service from a restricted jurisdiction, including via VPN or proxy, is a breach of these Terms and may lead to account closure and forfeiture of funds.

policy.title: 7.1 Crypto-Only Policy
items: {siteName} accepts deposits and withdrawals in supported cryptocurrencies only (e.g., BTC, ETH, USDT, TRX, BNB). No fiat, card, or bank-transfer deposits are accepted.
All deposits must originate from wallets you control. Deposits from third-party wallets are prohibited.

deposits.title: 7.2 Deposits
items: Deposits are credited after the required blockchain confirmations. Network (gas) fees are payable by you.
{siteName} may refuse or reverse deposits that appear to originate from blocked addresses or restricted sources.

withdrawals.title: 7.3 Withdrawals
items: Withdrawals are processed to the wallet address you provide. {siteName} may require you to confirm the destination wallet prior to processing.
You must have sufficient cleared balance to cover a withdrawal. Withdrawals may be delayed to investigate suspected abuse or unusual activity.

chargebacks.title: 7.4 Chargebacks & Reversals
items: Crypto transactions are final on-chain. If {siteName} incurs losses because of chargebacks or reversals from third-party service providers (rare with on-chain), we reserve the right to recover amounts or charge administrative fees.

kyc.title: 8. No Routine Identity Verification (No KYC)
kyc.content1: 8.1 {siteName} does not perform routine identity verification (KYC) as a condition of normal play. Users can connect a wallet via Dynamic.xyz and start playing without providing identity documents.
kyc.content2: 8.2 Notwithstanding the above, {siteName} reserves the right to request information or suspend transactions if required to:
items: Comply with a lawful order from the competent authorities:
Prevent, investigate, or remediate fraud, money-laundering, or other illegal activity
Or protect the security and integrity of the platform.
kyc.content3: 8.3 If you refuse to provide such information when legally required, {siteName} may restrict or close your account and delay or withhold withdrawals to the extent permitted by law.

fairPlay.title: 9. Fair Play, Prohibited Conduct & Security
items: Use bots, scripts, automated play tools, or any unauthorized software.
Collude with other players or manipulate game outcomes.
Create multiple accounts to exploit bonuses or promotions.
Attempt to reverse or tamper with on-chain transactions.
Exploit game bugs or platform vulnerabilities.
fairPlay.outro1: Accounts found cheating, colluding, or exploiting the platform may be suspended, closed, or have balances forfeited.
fairPlay.outro2: {siteName} implements technical and behavioral monitoring to protect platform integrity.

bonuses.title: 10. Bonuses & Promotions
items: All bonus offers and promotions are subject to specific Bonus Terms stated with each offer.
Bonus abuse (including multiple accounts or rapid bonus switching) can lead to denial, reversal, or forfeiture of bonuses and closure of accounts.
Bonus wagering requirements must be met before withdrawing bonus-derived funds, as specified per promotion.

playingRules.title: 11. Playing Rules & Game Settlement
items: Bets are accepted only once you receive on-screen confirmation. Bets placed with insufficient balance are void.
{siteName}'s internal logs and blockchain records are authoritative in case of disputes.
If an event is canceled, suspended, or otherwise compromised, {siteName} will settle or void bets according to published game and market rules.
For provably-fair games, verification tools and server seeds (where applicable) are made available per game; server logs are final.

errors.title: 12. Errors, Interruptions & Limits
errors.intro: {siteName} is not liable for losses caused by:
items: Internet or device failures
Blockchain delays, forks, or network congestion
Software bugs or third-party service outages
errors.outro1: {siteName} reserves the right to void bets, adjust balances, or cancel transactions when errors or exploits are detected.
errors.outro2: We may set wagering limits, maximum wins, and other controls to protect users and the platform.

suspension.title: 13. Suspension, Closure & Fund Handling
suspension.intro: {siteName} may suspend or close accounts where:
items: Terms are violated
Abuse, fraud, or suspicious behavior is detected
Legal or regulatory obligations require it

responsibleGambling.title: Responsible Gambling at {siteName}
responsibleGambling.subtitle: At {siteName}, we want gaming to be safe, fun, and something you can walk away from at any time. We're all about keeping things in balance‚Äîso you play for enjoyment, not to make money or fix your finances.

intro.title: Responsible Gambling at {siteName}
intro.paragraph1: At {siteName}, we want gaming to be safe, fun, and something you can walk away from at any time. We're all about keeping things in balance‚Äîso you play for enjoyment, not to make money or fix your finances.
intro.paragraph2: If you're under 18, or below your area's legal age, you can't use our platform. We take that seriously.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: We believe in clear, honest, and secure gaming. {siteName} exists to help you make smart choices and keep gambling from becoming a problem.

beliefs.0: Gambling is entertainment. It's not a way to get rich.
beliefs.1: Know yourself, set limits, and don't overdo it.
beliefs.2: We give you tools and resources to help you stay in control.

understanding.title: What Responsible Gambling Really Means
understanding.paragraph1: Online gambling is everywhere these days. That makes it easier to lose track of time, money, or even why you started playing in the first place.|Responsible gambling means knowing your boundaries, staying sharp, and not letting things get out of hand.

tips.0: Play for the fun of it, not for profit.
tips.1: Don't try to win back losses. Take breaks if you need them.
tips.2: Set a spending and time limit for yourself, and stick to it.
tips.3: Never gamble when you're tired, stressed, or upset.
tips.4: Don't use money that's meant for bills or other needs.
tips.5: If it stops being fun, step away.

selfCheck.title: Quick Self-Check: Are You Still in Control?

questions.0: Do you lose track of time gambling?
questions.1: Has it hurt your relationships or work?
questions.2: Do you get annoyed when you can't play?
questions.3: Are you gambling to escape boredom or stress?
questions.4: Have you borrowed money or crypto just to keep playing?
questions.5: Do you chase losses, betting more to try to win it back?

selfCheck.warning: If you answered "yes" to several, it's time to rethink how you're playing and maybe reach out for help.

tools.title: How {siteName} Helps You Stay on Track
tools.intro: We want you to enjoy yourself, but we also want you to stay safe.|Here's what we offer:

selfExclusion.title: Self-Exclusion
selfExclusion.description: Need a break? You can ask to block your account temporarily or forever. During this time, you won't be able to play or get promo emails. Just reach out to us at {siteName} and we'll handle it privately.

coolingOff.title: Cooling-Off Periods
coolingOff.paragraph1: If you feel things getting out of hand, take a break for 24 hours, a week, or a month. During this time, you can't connect your wallet to play.
coolingOff.paragraph2: During this time, you can't connect your wallet to play.

depositAwareness.title: Deposit & Loss Awareness
depositAwareness.description: Since everything runs through crypto wallets, you can see all your deposits and bets right on the blockchain. Keep an eye on your activity so you always know where you stand.

underagePrevention.title: Protecting Minors
underagePrevention.paragraph1: No gambling for anyone under 18. We mean it.
underagePrevention.tipsTitle: Parents and guardians, here are some tips:

tips.0: Use passwords or lock your devices.
tips.1: Don't save wallet info on shared computers or phones.
tips.2: Always log out if you're stepping away.
tips.3: Use tools like NetNanny or GamBlock to block gambling sites.
tips.4: Check in on your kids' online activity.

underagePrevention.warning: If we find out someone underage is playing, we'll shut down their account and cancel any winnings.

helpSupport.title: Need Support? You're Not Alone
helpSupport.intro: If gambling starts hurting your mood, relationships, or finances, please reach out. Here are some organizations that can help, no matter where you are:
helpSupport.paragraph2: They offer self-tests, live chat, and local support groups.

0.title: Transparency
0.description: Every game is provably fair and blockchain-verified.

1.title: Security
1.description: Your sessions are always protected by Dynamic.xyz wallet login. No passwords, no KYC.

3.title: Education
3.description: We help you understand risks and keep you informed.

4.title: Community Support
4.description: Our team is here for you, 24/7.

playSmart.title: Final Thoughts
playSmart.intro: Gambling should be enjoyable, social, and balanced. Before you play, set a time limit. Don't chase losses or play when you're upset. Treat any winnings as a nice bonus, not a paycheck. Play smart, and don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it.

reminders.0: Gambling should be enjoyable, social, and balanced.
reminders.1: Before you play, set a time limit.
reminders.2: Don't chase losses or play when you're upset.
reminders.3: Treat any winnings as a nice bonus, not a paycheck.
reminders.4: Play smart, and don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it.

finalMessage.paragraph1: Don't let gambling spill into your work or relationships. If it stops being fun, just walk away.|At {siteName}, we care about your well-being. Make smart choices, play safe, and look out for yourself.
finalMessage.paragraph2: Don't let gambling spill into your work or relationships. If it stops being fun, just walk away.
finalMessage.contact: Need help, advice, or want to take a break? Reach out anytime at {siteName}.

faqs.title: FAQs ‚Äì {siteName}
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common {siteName} questions. Learn about wallet login, deposits, withdrawals, fair play, and blockchain transparency.
faqs.intro: Welcome to the {siteName} FAQ Center, where you'll find quick answers to the most common questions about our crypto gaming platform.|If you can't find your answer here, our 24/7 support team is always ready to help at {siteName}.

0.question: 1. Can I register on your website?
0.answer: Yes ‚Äî registration is open to anyone 18 years or older (or the legal age of majority in your jurisdiction).|You must also ensure that online gaming is legal where you reside.|At {siteName}, you don't need traditional sign-ups or passwords.|Simply connect your wallet via Dynamic.xyz to start playing instantly.|üëâ For legal and compliance details, please review our Terms & Conditions.
0.reminder: Reminder: Gambling can be addictive. Please play responsibly and know your limits.

1.question: 2. What if I forget my login details?
1.answer: Since {siteName} uses wallet-based login via Dynamic.xyz, you don't use traditional passwords.|To access your account again:|Reconnect your wallet using the same address you originally used.|If you've lost access to your wallet, please restore it with your seed phrase or backup method (we never store or control private keys).|{siteName} cannot reset or recover your wallet credentials for security reasons.

2.question: 3. Can I change my username or linked wallet?
2.answer: Your {siteName} account is tied to your wallet address.|To use a new wallet, simply connect a new one ‚Äî but note that your previous gaming history, VIP status, and bonuses will not transfer automatically.

3.question: 4. How do I become a VIP member?
3.answer: Our VIP program is exclusive and invitation-only.|As you play and engage with the {siteName} community, your gaming activity is automatically tracked.|Once eligible, you'll receive an official invitation via in-platform notification or direct message from the {siteName} team.|VIPs enjoy access to exclusive bonuses, faster withdrawals, and personalized rewards.

0.question: 5. How do I deposit crypto?
0.answer: Depositing on {siteName} is fast and simple:|Go to "My Wallet" on the main dashboard.|Choose Deposit and select your preferred cryptocurrency (e.g., BTC, ETH, USDT, BNB).|Copy your unique wallet address or scan the QR code.|Send your crypto from your external wallet to the address displayed.|Once confirmed on the blockchain, your funds will appear in your {siteName} balance automatically.|‚ö†Ô∏è Make sure you only send supported cryptocurrencies to the correct address network (e.g., ERC20, TRC20, BEP20).

1.question: 6. How long do deposits take?
1.answer: Deposits are usually confirmed within 5‚Äì10 minutes, depending on blockchain congestion and transaction fees.|You can track the progress of your transaction through a block explorer (e.g., Etherscan.io or BscScan.com) using your transaction hash (TXID).|A minimum of 3 confirmations is typically required for your deposit to appear in your balance.

2.question: 7. What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
2.answer: The minimum withdrawal amount depends on the cryptocurrency you are using.|Each coin has its own network fee and minimum threshold.|These values are displayed in the Withdraw section under "My Wallet."

3.question: 8. How do I withdraw my winnings?
3.answer: To withdraw your crypto:|Go to "My Wallet" ‚Üí "Withdraw."|Enter your destination wallet address and the amount you wish to withdraw.|Double-check your address and network type before confirming.|Withdrawals are processed instantly, but may take a few minutes depending on blockchain network activity.|üí° Always ensure your receiving wallet supports the network you're withdrawing from.

4.question: 9. What if my transaction is delayed?
4.answer: Blockchain transactions sometimes take longer due to network congestion or low gas fees.|If your deposit or withdrawal hasn't arrived:|Check your TXID on the blockchain explorer.|Confirm that you used the correct network and address.|If it's been more than an hour, contact {siteName} with your TXID and wallet details.

0.question: 10. Are {siteName} games fair?
0.answer: Yes ‚Äî all {siteName} games are built using provably fair technology and verified smart contracts.|Every bet, result, and payout can be independently verified on the blockchain.|We operate on transparent, tamper-proof systems that guarantee randomness, fairness, and openness.|You can view game outcomes and transaction proofs on-chain through Etherscan or the respective network explorer.

1.question: 11. What should I do if a game freezes or crashes?
1.answer: If your game stops responding:|Refresh the page.|Clear your browser cache and reconnect your wallet.|If the issue persists, contact our support team via Live Chat or {siteName}.|Our team will assist you in restoring your game session or balance if affected.

2.question: 12. Can I use more than one wallet or account?
2.answer: No.|Each player is permitted to use one wallet address as their primary account.|Creating multiple accounts or using wallet rotations to claim bonuses or exploit promotions is strictly prohibited and may result in account restriction or balance forfeiture.

3.question: 13. Is my personal data safe?
3.answer: Yes.|At {siteName}, we do not collect personal data ‚Äî your identity remains secure.|Access is managed through Dynamic.xyz, ensuring full privacy and ownership of your digital identity.|No passwords, emails, or sensitive documents are stored by us.|Your wallet = your identity.

0.question: 14. Does {siteName} support responsible gambling?
0.answer: Absolutely.|We encourage every player to enjoy gaming in moderation.|You can request a self-exclusion period or take a cooling-off break anytime by contacting {siteName}.|If you feel gambling is affecting your life, visit our Responsible Gambling page for resources and help organizations.

1.question: 15. What should I do if I suspect a gambling problem?
1.answer: If you feel your gambling is getting out of control, take a break and reach out to one of these trusted organizations for confidential help:|GamCare: https://www.gamcare.org.uk|Gambling Therapy: https://www.gamblingtherapy.org|Gamblers Anonymous: https://www.gamblersanonymous.org|Our support team can also guide you on limiting access to your account safely.

blockchainTransparency.title: üß© Blockchain Transparency
blockchainTransparency.paragraph1: {siteName} is powered by Ethereum-based smart contracts, ensuring that every bet, transaction, and reward is recorded transparently on-chain.|All data and game logic are immutable and verifiable, ensuring true fairness and auditability.|You can track all platform transactions through public explorers such as:|Etherscan.io|BscScan.com|TronScan.org
blockchainTransparency.guarantee: This guarantees that no manipulation or bias can occur ‚Äî ever.

needMoreHelp.liveChat: üí¨ Live Chat (available inside your wallet-connected dashboard)

clauses.content: {siteName} is owned and operated by {siteName} N.V. ("{siteName}", "We", "Our", "Us"),

{siteName} is a crypto-wallet-only casino. All deposits, wagers, and withdrawals are processed through users' cryptocurrency wallets. We support wallet login through Dynamic.xyz and compatible wallet connectors (e.g., WalletConnect / MetaMask).

By registering or connecting your wallet on www.{siteDomain} (the "Website"), you enter into a binding agreement with {siteName} N.V. and agree to: (i) these Terms and Conditions; (ii) our Privacy Policy; (iii) our Cookie Policy; (iv) our Affiliate Terms; and (v) our Responsible Gaming Policy.
If you do not agree with any of these terms, do not access, use, or register on our Website.
Read these Terms carefully. If you are uncertain about your rights or obligations, consult a legal advisor in your jurisdiction before using the Website.
Upon registration or wallet connection, you ("User", "Player", "You", or "Your") agree to comply with all {siteName} rules and policies.
This Agreement is a legally binding contract between you and {siteName}.
These Terms become effective the moment you connect your wallet and start using the site.
{siteName} reserves the right to amend or update these Terms at any time. Changes will be published on the Website; continued use constitutes acceptance.
In the event of conflict, these Terms prevail over any other rules, promotions, or external materials.
Only the English version of these Terms is legally binding. Translations are for convenience only.

{siteName} uses Dynamic.xyz (or other supported connectors) for wallet-based login and authentication. By connecting a wallet, you confirm you are the lawful owner of that wallet and authorize {siteName} to recognize that wallet as your account.
We never request your private keys. You must keep your wallet credentials and device secure. {siteName} is not responsible for losses caused by compromised wallets or leaked private keys.
You may be asked to provide contact details (email, username) for account communication. You must provide accurate information and keep it up to date.
You are responsible for all actions taken using your connected wallet.
Only one account per individual is permitted. Multiple accounts or attempts to circumvent limits may result in account suspension and fund forfeiture.
Enable any offered platform security features (for example, 2FA for associated services) and secure your own wallet.
Notify support immediately if you suspect unauthorized access.

You represent and warrant that:|‚Ä¢ You are at least 18 years old (or the minimum legal gambling age in your jurisdiction).|‚Ä¢ You are legally permitted to use online crypto gambling services where you are located.|‚Ä¢ You are the lawful owner of the wallet you connect.|‚Ä¢ You will not use VPNs or location spoofing to bypass regional restrictions.|‚Ä¢ You will not use the Service for illegal or commercial purposes.|‚Ä¢ You accept that cryptocurrency value may fluctuate and you bear all market risk.
If you breach these warranties, {siteName} may suspend or terminate access and withhold funds where permitted by law.

{siteName} does not accept players from jurisdictions where crypto gambling is prohibited or restricted. This includes, but is not limited to:|United States (and U.S. territories), United Kingdom, France, Netherlands, Spain, Germany, Australia, Austria, Comoros, Iran, North Korea, Sudan, Syria, and any jurisdiction listed on FATF blacklists.
Attempting to access the Service from a restricted jurisdiction, including via VPN or proxy, is a breach of these Terms and may lead to account closure and forfeiture of funds.
{siteName} accepts deposits and withdrawals in supported cryptocurrencies only (e.g., BTC, ETH, USDT, TRX, BNB). No fiat, card, or bank-transfer deposits are accepted.
All deposits must originate from wallets you control. Deposits from third-party wallets are prohibited.
Deposits are credited after the required blockchain confirmations. Network (gas) fees are payable by you.
{siteName} may refuse or reverse deposits that appear to originate from blocked addresses or restricted sources.
Withdrawals are processed to the wallet address you provide. {siteName} may require you to confirm the destination wallet prior to processing.
You must have sufficient cleared balance to cover a withdrawal. Withdrawals may be delayed to investigate suspected abuse or unusual activity.

Crypto transactions are final on-chain. If {siteName} incurs losses because of chargebacks or reversals from third-party service providers (rare with on-chain), we reserve the right to recover amounts or charge administrative fees.
{siteName} does not perform routine identity verification (KYC) as a condition of normal play. Users can connect a wallet via Dynamic.xyz and start playing without providing identity documents.

Notwithstanding clause 8.1, {siteName} reserves the right to request information or suspend transactions if required to:|‚Ä¢ Comply with a lawful order from competent authorities;|‚Ä¢ Prevent, investigate, or remediate fraud, money-laundering, or other illegal activity; or|‚Ä¢ Protect the security and integrity of the platform.
If you refuse to provide such information when legally required, {siteName} may restrict or close your account and delay or withhold withdrawals to the extent permitted by law.

You must not:|‚Ä¢ Use bots, scripts, automated play tools, or any unauthorized software.|‚Ä¢ Collude with other players or manipulate game outcomes.|‚Ä¢ Create multiple accounts to exploit bonuses or promotions.|‚Ä¢ Attempt to reverse or tamper with on-chain transactions.|‚Ä¢ Exploit game bugs or platform vulnerabilities.
Accounts found cheating, colluding, or exploiting the platform may be suspended, closed, or have balances forfeited.
{siteName} implements technical and behavioral monitoring to protect platform integrity.
All bonus offers and promotions are subject to specific Bonus Terms stated with each offer.
Bonus abuse (including multiple accounts or rapid bonus switching) can lead to denial, reversal, or forfeiture of bonuses and closure of accounts.
Bonus wagering requirements must be met before withdrawing bonus-derived funds, as specified per promotion.
Bets are accepted only once you receive on-screen confirmation. Bets placed with insufficient balance are void.
{siteName}'s internal logs and blockchain records are authoritative in case of disputes.
If an event is canceled, suspended, or otherwise compromised, {siteName} will settle or void bets according to published game and market rules.
For provably-fair games, verification tools and server seeds (where applicable) are made available per game; server logs are final.
{siteName} is not liable for losses caused by:|‚Ä¢ Internet or device failures;|‚Ä¢ Blockchain delays, forks, or network congestion;|‚Ä¢ Software bugs or third-party service outages.
{siteName} reserves the right to void bets, adjust balances, or cancel transactions when errors or exploits are detected.
We may set wagering limits, maximum wins, and other controls to protect users and the platform.
{siteName} may suspend or close accounts where:|‚Ä¢ Terms are violated;|‚Ä¢ Abuse, fraud, or suspicious behavior is detected;|‚Ä¢ Legal or regulatory obligations require it.
On account closure, pending wagers may be canceled and remaining funds handled per applicable law and platform policy.
{siteName} may retain funds where necessary to resolve disputes, comply with lawful requests, or remediate losses.
{siteName} promotes responsible gambling. You may request:|‚Ä¢ Self-exclusion;|‚Ä¢ Deposit limits;|‚Ä¢ Temporary suspension.
If you suspect gambling harm, contact {siteName} for immediate assistance.
Underage gambling (under 18 or the local legal age) is strictly prohibited. Accounts found to belong to minors will be closed and funds handled per policy.
All trademarks, logos, site content, software, and game assets on {siteName} are owned or licensed by {siteName}. Unauthorized copying, scraping, or redistribution is prohibited.
You are granted a limited, revocable license to access the Service for personal entertainment only.
To the fullest extent permitted by law, {siteName} will not be liable for indirect, special, consequential or incidental losses, including lost profits or opportunity costs.
Our aggregate liability for any claim related to these Terms shall not exceed the value of your last deposit or an amount specified by applicable law.
Nothing in these Terms limits liability for death or personal injury caused by negligence where applicable law prohibits such limitation.
In case of dispute, contact {siteName}. We aim to resolve complaints quickly; escalate to management if needed.
{siteName} may amend these Terms at any time. Updated Terms will be posted on the Website. Continued use constitutes acceptance.
These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and {siteName} regarding the Service.
If any clause is found unenforceable, it will be modified to the minimum extent necessary and the remaining provisions will remain in effect.
You may not assign your rights under these Terms. {siteName} may assign or subcontract rights and obligations.
